scripts.start:dev: dotenv -e .env.development concurrently "tsc -w" "nodemon --watch ./dist/ --exec 'yarn generate && yarn function-framework' " & dotenv -e .env.development npx prisma studio
scripts.start:local: dotenv -e .env.local concurrently "tsc -w" "nodemon --watch ./dist/ --exec 'yarn generate && yarn function-framework'" & dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma studio
scripts.start:staging: dotenv -e .env.staging concurrently "tsc -w" "nodemon --watch ./dist/ --exec 'yarn generate && yarn function-framework'" & dotenv -e .env.staging -- npx prisma studio
scripts.start:production: dotenv -e .env.production concurrently "tsc -w" "nodemon --watch ./dist/ --exec 'yarn generate && yarn function-framework'" & dotenv -e .env.production -- npx prisma studio
scripts.reset:db:local: dotenv -e .env.local npx prisma db push --force-reset && dotenv -e .env.local npx prisma db seed
scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy graphql --runtime nodejs16 --project=klotti-app-dev --region=australia-southeast1 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars NODE_ENV=development
